channel.title: CVE Feed for Navarino -- Infinity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Navarino -- Infinity

item.title: CVE-2018-5386|2024-08-05T05:33:44.404Z -- navarino -- infinity
item.description: Some Navarino Infinity functions, up to version 2.2, placed in the URL can bypass any authentication mechanism leading to an information leak.

item.title: CVE-2018-5385|2024-08-05T05:33:44.207Z -- navarino -- infinity
item.description: Navarino Infinity is prone to session fixation attacks. The server accepts the session ID as a GET parameter which can lead to bypassing the two factor authentication in some installations. This could lead to phishing attacks that can bypass the two factor authentication that is present in some installations.

item.title: CVE-2018-5384|2024-08-05T05:33:44.385Z -- navarino -- infinity
item.description: Navarino Infinity web interface up to version 2.2 exposes an unauthenticated script that is prone to blind sql injection. If successfully exploited the user can get info from the underlying postgresql database that could lead into to total compromise of the product. The said script is available with no authentication.
